mapper.select: SELECT A.pic pic, A.nm name, A.gender , A.birthdate, A.phone , A.student_num studentNum, B.major_name majorName , A.created_at createdAt, A.email, sum(C.score) scoreStudent, B.graduation_score graduationScore , A.grade grade, C.isemester isemester, B.ilecture ilecture , A.student_num studentNum, C.avg_score avgScore, avg(C.rating) rating FROM student A INNER JOIN major B ON A.imajor = B.imajor INNER JOIN student_semester_score C ON A.istudent = C.istudent WHERE A.istudent = #{istudent};
